title: Carragher ´surprised´ by Alexander-Arnold´s Anfield reception against Arsenal
description: Jamie Carragher said he was “surprised” by how many boos were heard when Trent Alexander-Arnold came on during Liverpool’s 2-2 draw with Arsenal on Sunday. Earlier this week, Alexander-Arnold confirmed he would be leaving the club at the end of the season, with a move to Real Madrid expected to be confirmed in the summer. title: Inzaghi: Rotation key for Champions League and Serie A chasers Inter
description: Simone Inzaghi believes that careful squad management is crucial for his team as he aims to balance their Serie A title charge along with the Champions League final. Inzaghi watched on as Inter earned a 2-0 victory over Torino on Sunday, but rung the changes following their dramatic aggregate victory over Barcelona in midweek.
